content: round 2 knit all stitches maintaining pattern on needles 2 and 3 repeat rounds 1 and 2 until you have 16 17 18 sts left on needles 1 and 4 64 68 72 sts foot continue knitting as established knit all sole sts knit instep in pattern until you reach your desired foot length time to choose your toe toe option #1 plain toe round 1 needle 1 knit to last 3 sts k2tog k1 needle 2 k1 ssk knit to end needle 3 knit to last 3 sts k2tog k1 needle 4 k1 ssk knit to end round 2 knit continue alternating rounds 1 and 2 until there are 8 sts left on each needle 32 total then continue with decrease rounds only omitting plain rounds until there are 4 stitches on each needle 16 total divide sts evenly over 2 needles so you have 8 st each for top of foot and sole cut yarn leaving a 30cm/8 tail for grafting graft toes shut toe option #2 ribbed toe round 1 needle 1 knit to last 3 sts k2tog k1 needle 2 k1 ssk knit in pattern to end needle 3 knit in pattern to last 3 sts k2tog k1 needle 4 k1 ssk knit to end round 2 needle 1 knit to last 2 sts k2 needle 2 k2 knit in pattern to end needle 3 knit in pattern to last 2 sts k2 needle 4 k2 knit to end continue alternating rounds 1 and 2 until there are 8 sts left on each needle 32 total then continue with decrease rounds only omitting plain rounds until there are 4 stitches on each needle 16 total divide sts evenly over 2 needles so you have 8 st each for top of foot and sole cut yarn leaving a 30cm/8 tail for grafting graft toes shut questions or comments just drop me a line heather sebastian joey s house email joeyshouse@golden net blog www joeyshouse wordpress com facebook www facebook com/pages/joeys-house/248286781898716 twitter www twitter com/# /joeyshouse ravelry joeyshouse dennis socks copyright 2014 by heather sebastian joey s house kitchener ontario canada this pattern is for personal use only don t be fancy ok
